package.name: firefox
package.unpack: tar xjf ${SRCDIR}/firefox-${PKGVERSION}.source.tar.bz2 # mv mozilla-esr31 mozilla-release mkdir l10n tar -C l10n -xJf ${SRCDIR}/firefox-${PKGVERSION}.source.de-es-pl-ru.tar.xz
package.build:
echo $SHELL export SHELL=/bin/bash echo $SHELL dir=`pwd ` sed -i 's%PWD%'${dir}'/%g' mozilla-release/.mozconfig sed -i 's%# ac_add_options --with-l10n%ac_add_options --with-l10n%g' mozilla-release/.mozconfig cd mozilla-release if [ -n "$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" ] ; then jobcount=` expr $DISTCC_HOSTCOUNT '*' 3 ` sed -i "s%MOZ_MAKE_FLAGS=\"-j2\"%MOZ_MAKE_FLAGS=\"-j${jobcount} CC='distcc gcc' CXX='distcc g++'\"%g" .mozconfig make -f client.mk clean make -f client.mk configure pump make -f client.mk build else make -f client.mk clean make -f client.mk configure make -f client.mk build fi echo '===> Trying to find libxul.so...' find ff-build -type f -name libxul.so
ccount=0 while [ '!' -f ff-build/toolkit/library/build/libxul.so -a $ccount -lt 2 ] ; do echo '===> Linking libxul.so failed, trying again in 5 minutes...' sleep 300 make -f client.mk build ccount=` expr $ccount + 1 ` done [ -f ff-build/toolkit/library/build/libxul.so ] || exit 1
# Now try to build the language packs for packlang in de es-ES pl ru fr it nl pt-PT ; do echo '==> Build language pack for '${packlang} make -C ff-build/browser/locales langpack-${packlang} done
make -C ff-build package echo '==> Searching Tarballs' find ff-build -name '*.tar.bz2' | sort echo '==> Searching XPIs' find ff-build -name '*.xpi' | sort
package.install:
shortvers=` echo ${PKGVERSION} | sed 's/esr//g' ` TARFILE=mozilla-release/ff-build/dist/firefox-${shortvers}.en-US.linux-i686.tar.bz2 [ -f "$TARFILE" ] || exit 1
mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/opt mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/mozilla-addons mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/icons tar -C ${TGTDIR}/opt -xvjf "${TARFILE}" mv ${TGTDIR}/opt/firefox ${TGTDIR}/opt/firefox-${PKGVERSION}
# Install language packs mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/opt/firefox-${PKGVERSION}-extensions for packlang in de es-ES pl ru fr it nl pt-PT ; do install -m 0644 mozilla-release/ff-build/dist/linux-i686/xpi/firefox-${shortvers}.${packlang}.langpack.xpi \ ${TGTDIR}/opt/firefox-${PKGVERSION}-extensions/ done
# mkdir -p -m 0755 ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/mozilla-localization # for packlang in de es-ES pl ru fr it nl pt-PT ; do # rm -rf ${TGTDIR}/opt/firefox-${PKGVERSION}/extensions/langpack-${packlang}'@firefox.mozilla.org' # install -m 0644 mozilla-release/ff-build/dist/linux-i686/xpi/firefox-${PKGVERSION}.${packlang}.langpack.xpi \ # ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/mozilla-localization # mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/opt/firefox-${PKGVERSION}/extensions/langpack-${packlang}'@firefox.mozilla.org' # ( cd ${TGTDIR}/opt/firefox-${PKGVERSION}/extensions/langpack-${packlang}'@firefox.mozilla.org' ; # unzip ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/mozilla-localization/firefox-${PKGVERSION}.${packlang}.langpack.xpi ) # done
install -m 0644 ${TGTDIR}/opt/firefox-${PKGVERSION}/icons/mozicon128.png ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/icons/firefox128.png mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/opt/firefox-${PKGVERSION}/plugins touch ${TGTDIR}/opt/firefox-${PKGVERSION}/plugins/.intentionally_empty
mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin echo -n '' > ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin/firefox-${PKGVERSION} cat >> ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin/firefox-${PKGVERSION} << FFRUN #!/bin/sh
PATH=/static/bin:/static/sbin:\$PATH export PATH
. /etc/rc.defaults . /etc/rc.subr/extractbootparams
langopts="" echo "\$LANGUAGE" | grep '^de' >/dev/null && langopts="-contentLocale de-DE -UILocale de-DE" echo "\$LANGUAGE" | grep '^pl' >/dev/null && langopts="-contentLocale pl-PL -UILocale pl-PL" echo "\$LANGUAGE" | grep '^es' >/dev/null && langopts="-contentLocale es-ES -UILocale es-ES" echo "\$LANGUAGE" | grep '^ru' >/dev/null && langopts="-contentLocale ru-RU -UILocale ru-RU" echo "\$LANGUAGE" | grep '^fr' >/dev/null && langopts="-contentLocale fr-FR -UILocale fr-FR" echo "\$LANGUAGE" | grep '^it' >/dev/null && langopts="-contentLocale it-IT -UILocale it-IT" echo "\$LANGUAGE" | grep '^nl' >/dev/null && langopts="-contentLocale nl-NL -UILocale nl-NL" echo "\$LANGUAGE" | grep '^pt' >/dev/null && langopts="-contentLocale pt-PT -UILocale pt-PT"
[ "\$security" '!=' "smack" ] && exec /opt/firefox-${PKGVERSION}/firefox \$langopts \$@
if [ "\$#" -lt 1 ] ; then exec sudo /opt/firefox-${PKGVERSION}/firefox_smack else if ps waux | grep 'surfer /opt/.*/firefox-bin' | grep -v grep ; then /opt/firefox-${PKGVERSION}/firefox \$@ else sudo /opt/firefox-${PKGVERSION}/firefox_smack & sleep 5 exec /opt/firefox-${PKGVERSION}/firefox \$@ fi fi FFRUN
rm ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin/firefox ln -sf /usr/bin/firefox-${PKGVERSION} ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin/firefox chmod a+rx ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin/firefox-${PKGVERSION}
echo -n '' > ${TGTDIR}/opt/firefox-${PKGVERSION}/firefox_smack cat >> ${TGTDIR}/opt/firefox-${PKGVERSION}/firefox_smack << FFSMACK #!/static/bin/ash
langopts="" echo "\$LANGUAGE" | grep '^de' >/dev/null && langopts="-contentLocale de-DE -UILocale de-DE" echo "\$LANGUAGE" | grep '^pl' >/dev/null && langopts="-contentLocale pl-PL -UILocale pl-PL" echo "\$LANGUAGE" | grep '^es' >/dev/null && langopts="-contentLocale es-ES -UILocale es-ES" echo "\$LANGUAGE" | grep '^ru' >/dev/null && langopts="-contentLocale ru-RU -UILocale ru-RU" echo "\$LANGUAGE" | grep '^fr' >/dev/null && langopts="-contentLocale fr-FR -UILocale fr-FR" echo "\$LANGUAGE" | grep '^it' >/dev/null && langopts="-contentLocale it-IT -UILocale it-IT" echo "\$LANGUAGE" | grep '^nl' >/dev/null && langopts="-contentLocale nl-NL -UILocale nl-NL" echo "\$LANGUAGE" | grep '^pt' >/dev/null && langopts="-contentLocale pt-PT -UILocale pt-PT"
if [ -f /etc/lesslinux/banking/allowedservers.xml ] && [ -f /usr/bin/smack_bankrules.rb ] ; then timeout -t 5 /static/sbin/newsmack netmgr /usr/bin/ruby /usr/bin/smack_bankrules.rb fi /static/sbin/newsmack internet /static/bin/su surfer -c "/opt/firefox-${PKGVERSION}/firefox \$langopts"
FFSMACK
chmod a+rx ${TGTDIR}/opt/firefox-${PKGVERSION}/firefox_smack /sbin/paxctl -m -r ${TGTDIR}/opt/firefox-${PKGVERSION}/firefox-bin
chown -R 0:0 ${TGTDIR}/opt/firefox-${PKGVERSION}
